concept.description: Labels all test methods annotated with "org.junit.@Test" with TEST and JUNIT4.
concept.cypher: MATCH (m:METHOD)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->(a:CLASS) WHERE a.FQN="org.junit.Test" SET m:TEST:JUNIT4 RETURN m as method

concept.description: Labels all classes containing test methods with TEST and JUNIT4.
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:CLASS)-[:CONTAINS]->(m:METHOD:TEST:JUNIT4) SET t:TEST:JUNIT4 RETURN t AS class
